title: Rolling Windows
content:
# Rolling Windows

Rolling calculations are fundamental to technical analysis. They apply a function over a moving window of `n` periods.

## Moving Average (SMA)
`df.rolling(window=n).mean()`

## Rolling Volatility
`df.rolling(window=n).std()`

## Rolling Max/Min
Useful for finding recent highs or lows (Donchian Channels).
`df.rolling(window=n).max()`
code:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

prices = pd.Series([10, 11, 12, 11, 13, 15, 14, 13, 12, 11])

# 3-Period Rolling Mean
sma = prices.rolling(window=3).mean()

# 3-Period Rolling Max
roll_max = prices.rolling(window=3).max()

df = pd.DataFrame({'Price': prices, 'SMA_3': sma, 'Max_3': roll_max})
print(df)
